articles.title: Did you follow the local news this week? Take our Greater Boston news quiz.
articles.description:
A Cape institution, the return of The Boss, and a leaving meteorologist are all part of this week’s news quiz.

The post Did you follow the local news this week? Take our Greater Boston news quiz. appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: The Boss returns to Boston for a concert this spring.
Kevin Lemanowicz, a local meteorologist, announces his departure after years on air.
Cape Cod diner, a local favorite, is reopening to serve residents again.
